field_expertise_type.name: expertise_type
field_expertise_type.label: What Type of Content Is This Page?

field_expertise_parent_query.name: expertise_parent_query
field_expertise_parent_query.label: Does This Page Have a Parent?

field_expertise_parent_id.name: expertise_parent_id
field_expertise_parent_id.label: Parent Page
field_expertise_parent_id.instructions: Pages with the Expertise content type can only have other pages with the Expertise content type as a parent.

field_expertise_short_desc_query.name: expertise_short_desc_query
field_expertise_short_desc_query.label: Use This Page's Intro Text As the Short Description for This Page?
field_expertise_short_desc_query.instructions:
Decide which text to use as the short description. The short description is what is included for this area of expertise page when it appears in search results and in lists on our site.

The Intro Text is defined in under the Page Header Details tab.

Whichever text that is used should be written in a way that generally informs and interests users with a short, relevant summary of what this page is about. Think of it like a pitch that convinces the user that this page is exactly what they're looking for.

If the intro text is not written in that way, the short description should be defined separately.

field_expertise_short_desc.name: post_excerpt
field_expertise_short_desc.label: Short Description for This Page
field_expertise_short_desc.instructions:
This will be the description included for this page when it appears in search results and in lists on our site.

Write a short description that generally informs and interests users with a short, relevant summary of what this page is about. Think of it like a pitch that convinces the user that this page is exactly what they're looking for.

The text will be limited to 160 characters. The preferred length is at least 110 characters.

field_expertise_featured_image.label: Featured Image for This Page
field_expertise_featured_image.name: _thumbnail_id
field_expertise_featured_image.instructions: Recommended dimensions: 1600x900 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1200x675. The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio.

field_expertise_page_title_options.label: Page Header Style
field_expertise_page_title_options.name: expertise_page_title_options
field_expertise_page_title_options.instructions: This selector is only visible to users with the following roles: Super Admin, Administrator, Editor.

field_expertise_page_title_graphic.label: Graphic Header Style Options
field_expertise_page_title_graphic.name: expertise_page_title_graphic
field_expertise_page_title_graphic.instructions: Reach out to UAMS Web Services to discuss whether this page would benefit from a different page header style.

field_expertise_page_title_landingpage.label: Marketing Landing Page Header Style Options
field_expertise_page_title_landingpage.name: expertise_page_title_landingpage

field_expertise_alternate_names.label: Alternate Names for This Area of Expertise
field_expertise_alternate_names.name: expertise_alternate_names
field_expertise_alternate_names.instructions:
Insert any other names, phrases or acronyms that this area of expertise may be known by. Separate each alternate name into its own item.

These alternate names will be used to help this page appear in search results for those terms.

field_expertise_youtube_link.name: expertise_youtube_link
field_expertise_youtube_link.label: Featured Video
field_expertise_youtube_link.instructions: Select a video from the UAMS YouTube or Vimeo accounts that features this area of expertise and that supports the content of this page. Include the full URL, including https://

field_expertise_podcast_name.name: expertise_podcast_name
field_expertise_podcast_name.label: UAMS Health Talk Podcast Topic Name
field_expertise_podcast_name.instructions: Include a single topic name as listed in the "Topics" dropdown of the embedded player on https://uamshealth.com/podcast/.

field_expertise_physicians.name: physician_expertise
field_expertise_physicians.label: Related Providers
field_expertise_physicians.instructions:
Include all providers who have this area of expertise.

The providers will be displayed on a subpage, arranged in alphabetical order by their last name.

field_expertise_providers_fpage_intro.label: Override Intro Text for Related Providers Subpage
field_expertise_providers_fpage_intro.name: expertise_providers_fpage_intro
field_expertise_providers_fpage_intro.instructions:
The default intro text is defined in Find-a-Doc Settings, written to be generic for all subpages of this type under any area of expertise. If you leave this field blank, the text from Find-a-Doc Settings will be used. If you add text here, that text will be used instead.

This will display on the related providers subpage in a pararaph underneath the page title.

The text will be limited to 117 characters. The preferred length is at least 110 characters.

field_expertise_locations.instructions:
Include all locations where this area of expertise is represented.

The locations will be displayed on a subpage, arranged in alphabetical order.

field_expertise_associated.name: expertise_associated
field_expertise_associated.label: Related Areas of Expertise
field_expertise_associated.instructions:
Include all areas of expertise that are related to this area of expertise. An example of a related area of expertise would be one that is also represented in treatment plans associated with this area of expertise.

Areas of expertise that are nested under this area of expertise are excluded from this list.

The related areas of expertise will be displayed on a subpage, arranged in alphabetical order.

field_expertise_associated_fpage_intro.label: Override Intro Text for Related Areas of Expertise Subpage
field_expertise_associated_fpage_intro.name: expertise_associated_fpage_intro
field_expertise_associated_fpage_intro.instructions:

field_expertise_clinical_resources.name: expertise_clinical_resources
field_expertise_clinical_resources.label: Related Clinical Resources
field_expertise_clinical_resources.instructions:
Include all clinical resources that are related to this area of expertise.

These clinical resources will be displayed on a subpage, arranged in the order in which they were published, with the most recently published resources being listed first.

field_expertise_clinical_resources_fpage.label: Override Intro Text for Related Clinical Resources Subpage

field_expertise_conditions_cpt.label: Related Conditions
field_expertise_conditions_cpt.name: expertise_conditions_cpt
field_expertise_conditions_cpt.instructions:
Include all conditions that are related to this area of expertise.

These conditions will be displayed in a block on the main page for this area of expertise, arranged in the alphabetical order.

field_expertise_conditions_fpage_intro.label: Override Intro Text for Related Conditions Block
field_expertise_conditions_fpage_intro.name: expertise_conditions_fpage_intro
field_expertise_conditions_fpage_intro.instructions:
The default intro text is defined in Find-a-Doc Settings, written to be generic for all blocks of this type on any area of expertise page(s). If you leave this field blank, the text from Find-a-Doc Settings will be used. If you add text here, that text will be used instead.

This will display in a related conditions block on the main page for this area of expertise in a pararaph underneath the block title.

The text will be limited to 117 characters. The preferred length is at least 110 characters.

field_expertise_treatments_cpt.name: expertise_treatments_cpt
field_expertise_treatments_cpt.label: Related Treatments and Procedures
field_expertise_treatments_cpt.instructions:
Include all treatments and procedures that are related to this area of expertise.

These treatments and procedures will be displayed in a block on the main page for this area of expertise, arranged in the alphabetical order.

field_expertise_treatments_fpage_intro.label: Override Intro Text for Related Treatments and Procedures Block
field_expertise_treatments_fpage_intro.name: expertise_treatments_fpage_intro
field_expertise_treatments_fpage_intro.instructions:
The default intro text is defined in Find-a-Doc Settings, written to be generic for all blocks of this type on any area of expertise page(s). If you leave this field blank, the text from Find-a-Doc Settings will be used. If you add text here, that text will be used instead.

This will display in a related treatments and procedures block on the main page for this area of expertise in a pararaph underneath the block title.

The text will be limited to 117 characters. The preferred length is at least 110 characters.

field_expertise_cta.label: Call-to-Action (CTA) Bar(s)
field_expertise_cta.name: expertise_cta
field_expertise_cta.instructions: Define up to two CTA Bar blocks

sub_fields.label: Action Type
sub_fields.name: cta_bar_action_type
sub_fields.instructions: Only choose None if your action is contained within your body text.

sub_fields.label: URL Action
sub_fields.instructions: All fields must be populated or your link will not display.

sub_fields.label: Button Link Description
sub_fields.name: cta_bar_button_description
sub_fields.instructions: This is needed for accessibility. It helps differentiate between multiple links that use the same text like "Learn more". Describe the intent of the link, like "Learn more about the ABC Department".

sub_fields.label: Phone Action
sub_fields.instructions: All fields must be populated or your telephone number will not display.

sub_fields.label: Text before phone number
sub_fields.name: cta_bar_phone_prepend
sub_fields.instructions: This, combined with the phone number will generate a short action phrase. Keep this text very short. Do not include the phone number here. Examples: "Call", "Fax Referrals to".

sub_fields.label: Phone Number
sub_fields.name: cta_bar_phone
sub_fields.instructions: Format your phone number using dashes. Include the area code. Example: 999-999-9999
